Enum InternetProtocolFamily

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<InternetProtocolFamily>
io.netty.channel.socket.InternetProtocolFamily
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<InternetProtocolFamily>
@Deprecated public enum InternetProtocolFamily extends Enum<InternetProtocolFamily>
Deprecated.
use SocketProtocolFamily.
Internet Protocol (IP) families used by the DatagramChannel
